Name: Cargo 3
About the game: Cargo 3 is a futuristic action game set in science-fiction horror world, which links the best features of the genre: unusual dynamics and thrilling high intensity of the gameplay. Our main goal was to create a unique, realistic and gloomy mood, build up tension and intensify fear, at the same time to provide players with a maximum of emotions and sensations. While producing the game, we also focused on giving the appearance of reality and authenticity, as well as ensuring a high degree of identification with a virtual hero. So if you are looking for thrills and gloomy worlds attract you and you like being scared, CARGO 3 is made for you. It is a blood-chilling game, which guarantees great entertainment and will also make your heart race. Of course, it is exclusively for adult players, as well as for those with strong nerves.
